repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in one series.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Item was found in the Ryder Collection of Confederate Archives in 2011; the Ryder collection was cataloged as part of the WPA in 1939/1940 but in later decades the catalog (A Calendar of the Ryder Collection of the Confederate Archives at Tufts College 1940) was forgotten and library staff added other materials to the Ryder collection, usually items from the South, from the 18th and 19th century and around the time of the Civil War.
Because it had not been part of the original Ryder collection, item was removed and a separate, 'artificial' collection was created.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one 8-page handwritten report written by Colonel Commanding Brigadier of Artillery William Batchelder Greene on May 2, 1863. In this report to Brigadier General William Farquhar Barry, Greene contradicts Brigadier General James S. Wadsworth's report to the Secretary of War regarding the 14th Regiment of Massachusetts Infantry.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. No documentation is available regarding the intellectual property rights in this collection.

controlaccess.subject: Civil War
controlaccess.geogname: United States. Army. Massachusetts Heavy Artillery Regiment, 1st (1862-1865)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series includes 8 page handwritten report by William Batchelder Greene (Colonel Commanding Brig. of Artillery) to Brigadier General William Farquhar Barry.

did.unittitle: Report by William Batchelder Greene (Colonel Commanding Brig. of Artillery) to Brigadier General William Farquhar Barry contradicting Brigadier General James S. Wadsworth report to the Secretary of War (and as included in the records of the Committee on the Conduct of the War) regarding the 14th Massachusetts Infantry
